attributes.action: secure free postage for parcels to be sent to Iraq, Afganistan and future conflicts for families and friends
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is being back by Lord Hanningfield and many more MPs. This has come about because it costs to much money to send parcels in the post. Money is always being splashed on other causes and i think soldiers deserve alot more and their families and friends. please support this petition, it would mean so much to us all. 
        Thankyou so much
         Mr David Cain
         Mr and Mrs JJ Dodsworth

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
